q: show's history faced the wailing would-bes minus founding judge/villain Simon Cowell .`` I'm beginning to see why the Hollywood Week group was so large this year( a reported 325),'' Mansfield wrote. This group of judges are a much softer touch than previous crews. They're much more likely to put somebody through on the strength of their personalities. Simon Cowell would have shut 75 percent of those people down. recap identified`` same dramatic music, same talk about making people's dreams come true, same sob stories with predictable tickets to Hollywood. It's comforting, or it's a snoozefest-- take your pick.
